prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that embodies calmness with a serene expression and soft colors.
Show me a unique fighting-type Pokemon with a slender build and a meditative stance.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines blue and white colors, showcasing a peaceful warrior spirit.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon with a distinct head shape and circular features, evoking tranquility.
Design a small psychic Pokemon with soft, rounded features and a focus on meditation.
Make a bipedal Pokemon that reflects both fighting prowess and serene meditation in its design.
Give me a Pokemon with graceful movements, emphasizing its psychic abilities and fighting style.

distinctive_features: Distinct head shape resembling a swirl
